page.title: 12LOCAL TRAFFIC
page.content: The traffic in the area is fairly buisy especially on Market day which is on a Wednesday when farmers take their livestock to market. During the rest on the week it is about average for a rural area. It fairly dangerous for the cars that are passing through the area because of the many sharp bends in the road.The road is called the B4348 and links Hay-On-Wye to Hereford.On the weekend there are more coaches taking groups of people to the country.During the weekdays there are coaches taking children to and from school. Mostly the traffic is not so buisy during the evening after 8.00pm
